title: Kingsblood
description: This year was different for Pax and her friends. Finally they were allowed to join the peace council, given the responsibility of helping the world. For Pax this idea was torture, to sit in a room when adventures could be had. However, she talks her friends into riding up the holy mountain one last time, before their world changes forever. Suddenly this group of friends are thrown into an adventure with unimaginable consequences.Can this group of friends reach a troubled border to stop a full scale war? The likes of which have not been seen for over a thousand years, back when the Gods still roamed Parthas...
author: J.S. Harris
